properties.name: operation
properties.description: Create a contact

options.name: Create
options.description: Create a contact

options.name: Get
options.description: Get a contact

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get many contacts

options.name: Update
options.description: Update a contact

properties.name: organizationId
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

properties.name: name
properties.description: Full name of contact/organisation

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: A user defined account number

options.name: accountNumber
options.description: A user defined account number

options.name: bankAccountDetails
options.description: Bank account number of contact

options.name: contactNumber
options.description: This field is read only on the Xero contact screen, used to identify contacts in external systems

options.name: contactStatus
options.description: The Contact is active and can be used in transactions

options.name: Active
options.description: The Contact is active and can be used in transactions

options.name: Archived
options.description: The Contact is archived and can no longer be used in transactions

options.name: GDPR Request
options.description: The Contact is the subject of a GDPR erasure request

options.name: defaultCurrency
options.description: Default currency for raising invoices against contact

options.name: emailAddress
options.description: Email address of contact person (umlauts not supported) (max length = 255)

options.name: firstName
options.description: First name of contact person (max length = 255)

options.name: lastName
options.description: Last name of contact person (max length = 255)

options.displayName: Purchase Default Account Code Name or ID
options.name: purchasesDefaultAccountCode
options.description: The default purchases account code for contacts. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.displayName: Sales Default Account Code Name or ID
options.name: salesDefaultAccountCode
options.description: The default sales account code for contacts. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: skypeUserName
options.description: Skype user name of contact

options.name: taxNumber
options.description: Tax number of contact

options.name: xeroNetworkKey
options.description: Store XeroNetworkKey for contacts

properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: options
properties.description: Whether contacts with a status of ARCHIVED will be included in the response

options.name: includeArchived
options.description: Whether contacts with a status of ARCHIVED will be included in the response

options.name: orderBy
options.description: Order by any element returned

options.name: where
options.description: The where parameter allows you to filter on endpoints and elements that don't have explicit parameters. Examples Here.

properties.name: operation
properties.description: Create a invoice

options.name: Create
options.description: Create a invoice

options.name: Get
options.description: Get a invoice

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get many invoices

options.name: Update
options.description: Update a invoice

properties.name: organizationId
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

properties.name: type
properties.description: Accounts Payable or supplier invoice

options.name: Bill
options.description: Accounts Payable or supplier invoice

options.name: Sales Invoice
options.description: Accounts Receivable or customer invoice

properties.name: lineItemsUi
properties.description: Line item data

values.name: description
values.description: A line item with just a description

values.name: quantity
values.description: LineItem Quantity

values.name: unitAmount
values.description: Lineitem unit amount. By default, unit amount will be rounded to two decimal places.

values.name: itemCode
values.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

values.name: accountCode
values.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

values.name: taxAmount
values.description: The tax amount is auto calculated as a percentage of the line amount based on the tax rate

values.name: lineAmount
values.description: The line amount reflects the discounted price if a DiscountRate has been used

values.name: discountRate
values.description: Percentage discount or discount amount being applied to a line item. Only supported on ACCREC invoices - ACCPAY invoices and credit notes in Xero do not support discounts.

values.name: trackingUi
values.description: Any LineItem can have a maximum of 2 TrackingCategory elements.

values.name: name
values.description: Name of the tracking category

values.name: option
values.description: Name of the option

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

options.name: brandingThemeId
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

options.name: currency
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

options.name: currencyRate
options.description: The currency rate for a multicurrency invoice. If no rate is specified, the XE.com day rate is used.

options.name: date
options.description: Date invoice was issued - YYYY-MM-DD. If the Date element is not specified it will default to the current date based on the timezone setting of the organisation.

options.name: dueDate
options.description: Date invoice is due - YYYY-MM-DD

options.name: expectedPaymentDate
options.description: Shown on sales invoices (Accounts Receivable) when this has been set

options.name: lineAmountType
options.description: Line items are exclusive of tax

options.name: Exclusive
options.description: Line items are exclusive of tax

options.name: Inclusive
options.description: Line items are inclusive tax

options.name: NoTax
options.description: Line have no tax

options.name: plannedPaymentDate
options.description: Shown on bills (Accounts Payable) when this has been set

options.name: reference
options.description: ACCREC only - additional reference number (max length = 255)

options.name: sendToContact
options.description: Whether the invoice in the Xero app should be marked as "sent". This can be set only on invoices that have been approved.

options.name: url
options.description: URL link to a source document - shown as "Go to [appName]" in the Xero app

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

alwaysOutputData.name: Always Output Data
alwaysOutputData.description: If active, will output a single, empty item when the output would have been empty. Use to prevent the workflow finishing on this node

executeOnce.name: Execute Once
executeOnce.description: If active, the node executes only once, with data from the first item it receives

retryOnFail.name: Retry On Fail
retryOnFail.description: If active, the node tries to execute again when it fails

maxTries.name: Max. Tries
maxTries.description: Number of times to attempt to execute the node before failing the execution

waitBetweenTries.name: Wait Between Tries (ms)
waitBetweenTries.description: How long to wait between each attempt (in milliseconds)

onError.name: On Error
onError.description: Action to take when the node execution fails

options.name: Stop Workflow
options.description: Halt execution and fail workflow

options.name: Continue
options.description: Pass error message as item in regular output

options.name: Continue (using error output)
options.description: Pass item to an extra `error` output

settings.note: Executable nodes have both common and executable settings
